author: Special Correspondent
text:
Complaints have been filed against two former State ministers, T.K.M. Chinnayya and Senthil Balaji.

According to the police a complaint was filed by M.R. Saravanan of Nanganallur in which he alleged that Mr. T.K.M. Chinnayya and another person had cheated him of his gold and money.

In the other complaint, Marimuthu of Tiruvallur alleged that Mr. Senthil Balaji and his aide had taken money from several people promising them jobs in the transport department but had not given any.
title: Complaints filed against former State ministers
